alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 07 at 4:31PM CDT until August 07 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL CHEYENNE AND SOUTHWESTERN RAWLINS COUNTIES IN NORTHWESTERN KANSAS... At 431 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles west of McDonald, or 17 miles south of Benkelman, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Off duty NWS employee reported quarter sized hail 2 miles north of Bird City. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bird City, McDonald and Beardsley. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
